config_fields.label: Webhook URL
config_fields.description: The URL to send webhook requests to

credential_fields.label: Secret
credential_fields.description: The current webhook secret used for signature verification. If not provided, a random one will be generated.

credential_fields.label: Rotate Secret
credential_fields.description: Set to 'true' to rotate the current secret. Current secret becomes previous_secret and a new secret is generated.
